site_name: Flat O, 26-27 Queen's Gate Gardens, LONDON, SW7 5RP
description: Internal alterations comprising at fourth floor level, the reconfiguration of kitchen and bathroom facilities, enlargement of opening between kitchen and dining room and reconfiguration of (non-original) stair, at fifth floor level, reconfiguration of the layout to create 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, new stairs to the roof terrace, relocation of the water tank from the closet return roof at fifth floor level to the main roof in connection with the creation of an external terrace at fifth floor level and finally, at roof level consolidation and reconfiguration of the existing water tanks and their enclosures, inclusion of 2 x new condenser units within acoustic enclosures (to provide AC to the whole apartment) and new roof access enclosure to provide access to the (existing) roof terrace via the new stairs.
